name: Zeb Pykosz
description: Frontend engineer with a penchant for UI/UX design, located in Middlebury, Vermont.

career.company_blurb: Faraday enables customer-centric growth teams to optimize experiences with predictive marketing and personalization at scale.
highlights: Built shopify plugin UI using company's existing React web app codebase
Built a number of CRUD UIs to enable users to create and manage their own custom data
Migrated existing components to typescript and styled-components
Tested UIs using testing-library, jest, and playwright
Built custom wordpress theme for award winning Middlebury Magazine
Designed and built award winning single-page marketing website for Monterey institute using gatsbyjs
Architected and managed frontend design systems for large scale site redesign project
Built numerous static websites for various departments and offices
Worked with clients to fulfill feature or bug fix requests
worked closely with designers to implement web project using their specs
Designed and built custom wordpress theme for company blog
Established modern frontend dev workflows using github, gulp, and sass
Built static company website using jekyll
Managed html content stored in cms
Designed, built, and A/B tested landing pages
Worked with other departments to manage their department specific content
Built html emails for marketing campaigns
